Uses of Class
org.taverna.server.master.exceptions.NoUpdateException

  • Packages that use NoUpdateException 
    Package Description
    org.taverna.server.master
    The core of the implementation of Taverna Server, including the implementations of the SOAP and REST interfaces.
    org.taverna.server.master.exceptions
    This package contains the exceptions/faults thrown by Taverna Server.
    org.taverna.server.master.interaction
    This package contains the Atom feed implementation for interactions for a particular workflow run.
    org.taverna.server.master.interfaces
    Interfaces to the main worker classes that provide the magical power that drives the webapp front-end.
    org.taverna.server.master.rest
    This package contains the RESTful interface to Taverna Server.
    org.taverna.server.master.rest.handler
    This package contains type handlers for the RESTful interface to Taverna Server.
    org.taverna.server.master.soap
    This package contains the SOAP interface to Taverna Server.

    • Uses of NoUpdateException in org.taverna.server.master.exceptions

      Subclasses of NoUpdateException in org.taverna.server.master.exceptions 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BadStateChangeException
      Exception that is thrown to indicate that the state change requested for a run is impossible.
      class  NoCreateException
      Exception that is thrown to indicate that the user is not permitted to create something.
      class  NoDestroyException
      Exception that is thrown to indicate that the user is not permitted to destroy something.
      class  OverloadedException
      Exception that is thrown to indicate that the state change requested for a run is currently impossible due to excessive server load.

      Make a new empty directory beneath an existing one, which must be the run's working directory or a directory beneath it.

      Set the contents of a file under the run's working directory.
      void TavernaServerSOAP.setRunGenerateProvenance(String runName, boolean generateProvenance)
      Sets whether to generate provenance (in a run bundle) for a run.
      void TavernaServerSOAP.setRunInputBaclavaFile(String runName, String fileName)
      Tells the run to use the given Baclava file for all inputs.
      void TavernaServerSOAP.setRunInputPortFile(String runName, String portName, String portFilename)
      Tells the run to use the given file for input on the given port.
      void TavernaServerSOAP.setRunInputPortListDelimiter(String runName, String portName, String delimiter)
      Tells the given run to use the given list delimiter (a single-character string value) for splitting the input on the given port.
      void TavernaServerSOAP.setRunInputPortValue(String runName, String portName, String portValue)
      Tells the run to use the given value for input on the given port.

      Set the value of a property for an event listener attached to a run.
      void TavernaServerSOAP.setRunOutputBaclavaFile(String runName, String outputFile)
      Set the Baclava file where the output of the run will be written.
      String TavernaServerSOAP.setRunStatus(String runName, Status status)
      Set the status of a run.

      Make a run for a particular workflow.
